title: Unable to connect and server lag
body:
I started getting really bad lag in game so I tried logging in and out. It won't load back in. I'm on Windstream in North Florida. My internet is fine I'm streaming video as we speak it's something to do with the connect to leagues server.

Thanks,
Please don't give me leaver buster :)

replies.body: Indeed, it sounds like you might be getting packet loss while trying to reach the game server.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for these impacted games, which can give us a better overview to know for sure.  We can't remove the [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ), but I'd really like to help get this resolved and get you back in game.
... and leaver bust. I knew it. Can I get some support in here to help. I don't feel this was deserved. I didn't leave on my own free will. I lost connect to League's servers mid game.
I got back into my game but my server ping is almost 30 seconds. Internet connect is fine.
